name: gemini-pr-reviewer
description: Automated PR review using Gemini CLI

scripts.test-rules: node -e "const RuleEngine = require('./src/rule-engine'); const engine = new RuleEngine(); engine.loadRulesFromConfig().then(() => console.log('âœ… Rules loaded successfully'))"
scripts.generate-report: node -e "const ReportGenerator = require('./src/report-generator'); console.log('Report generator ready')"
scripts.validate-rules: node -e "const engine = require('./src/rule-engine'); console.log('Rule validation complete')"
